Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"I highly recommend this company and will be a customer forever." "Problems solved with quality work and fair pricing!" "Aqua Medic is honest, fair, and competent in every service they offer."

After communicating with Tony for many months about replacing my 30 year old pool filter, I finally decided to have it replaced.Tony was responsive and we quickly agreed on a price (a fair one) and set up a date for installation. Tony … More Response from the owner 3 months ago Thank you Bert. It means alot to us that our customers are happy with our service and the products we install.

The salt cell broke on my pool equipment  at just under 2 years old.  I called Jandy and they confirmed it was still under warranty. … More Response from the owner 5 months ago Thank you So Much Donna! It was our pleasure to help you and your pool.

This is the 2nd time we have used Aqua Medic for our pool equipment needs.  They are so helpful and reasonable every time.  They got us back up and rolling the next day and Tony and Nannette are such nice people.  We highly recommend them to anyone with pool issues!! Response from the owner 5 months ago Thank you so much Colby! We are happy we could help.
